諰諰諰

Related Character(s): 謥
Связанный символ (и): 謥

諰字的基本解释

諰
xǐ
忧惧：“四方有志之士諰諰然，常恐天下之久不安。”
一边说话一边思考。
直言。

諰
shāi
语有所失。

諰
āi
呼叫人称諰。

諰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xǐ］
［《廣韻》胥里切，上止，心。］
(1)担心害怕。
(2)通“息”。塞。

諰字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諰； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1171第07
【唐韻】胥里切【集韻】想止切【韻會】【正韻】想里切，?音枲。【說文】思之意。【廣韻】言且思之。　又【類篇】直言也。　又懼貌。【荀子·議兵篇】諰諰然常恐天下之一合而軋己也。　又人名。【宋史·宗室表】武翼郞士諰。又【集韻】息攺切，顋上聲。【類篇】語也。　又【廣韻】山隹切【集韻】所隹切，?音籭。【說文】義同。又【類篇】語失也。　又【集韻】塢皆切，隘平聲。【類篇】呼彼之稱。　【說文】本作?。【字彙】同葸。

諰字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
諰字的起名意思

暂无。

髰
Basic explanation of words
髰
xǐ
Worry: "The people with lofty ideals in the Quartet are in a hurry, and they are often afraid of the long restlessness of the world."
Think while talking.
Bluntly.
髰
shāi
Language is lost.
髰
āi
The caller said it.
髰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xǐ］
["Guangyun" Xu Liqie, top stop, heart. ]
(1) Worry and fear.
(2) Through "interest". Stuffed.

[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　諰; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1171 Page 07
[Tang Yun] Xu Liqie [Jiyun] I want to stop cutting [Yunhui] [Zheng Yun] I want to cut it,? [Said the text] The meaning of thinking. 【Guangyun】Speak and think.　[Classes] Again, bluntly.　Fear of appearance again. 【Xunzi·Meeting the Soldiers】For a long time, I often fear that the world will unite and crush oneself.　Another name. [Song History · Clan Table] Wu Yi Xian Shi. [Jiyun] Breathed and cut, and sounded. [Classes] Language also.　[Guangyun] Mountain falcon cut [Jiyun] cut by falcon,? Yin 籭. 【Said the text】Same meaning. Also 【Classes】Language is also lost.　[Jiyun] The dock is cut, and the sound is flat. 【Classes】Call the other.　【Said the text】This work?. 【Vocabulary】Same as 葸.
